channel.title: Seabird on Masumbuko Semba's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Seabird on Masumbuko Semba's Blog

item.title: CTD Profiling in Tanga
item.description: In February 2020, The Institute of Marine Sciences (IMS) in collaboration with Tanzania Fisheries Research Institute (TAFIRI) collected oceanographic variables using CTD in coastal waters of Tanga .The sampled area had three transects from the shallow water below 50 meters deep and cruised to the middle of the Pemba channel. The data collection was completed in three days, each day with one transect. We started sampling with the southmost transect located at Kigombe, followed with the middle and finished with the northern transect located near the Tanga city (Figure 1).
